common.no_pull_requests: You haven't created any Pull Requests so far. Start contributing to the Open Source Community and Win a T-Shirt at 5 PRs
common.keep_it_up: Great job. The Open Source community is already thankful to you, but you can achieve more. Keep it up!
common.almost_there: You are almost there! One more to go and you will be able to wear one of the coolest T-Shirts out there
common.congratulations: You did it! Congratulations! Time to rest and wait for your well deserved T-Shirt!
